lead_paragraph: France's PSA Group struck a deal with General Motors to buy the U.S. carmaker's loss-making Opel division, two sources with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.
snippet: France's PSA Group struck a deal with General Motors to buy the U.S. carmaker's loss-making Opel division, two sources with knowledge of the matter told Reuters....

headline.main: Seavey Chases Elusive 5th Title as Iditarod Starts Saturday
